message.content: Michael Scott: Well, well, well, looks like we're talking about the highest points in the world! Michael Scott here, your go-to guy for all things exciting and adventurous. Now, when it comes to the highest mountains on Earth, we're talking about some serious altitude. We've got the mighty Mount Everest, standing tall at a whopping 29,032 feet (8,848 meters) above sea level. Can you imagine the view from up there? It's like being on top
